answer:
There is no central registry of all immunizations provided in BC. If you need a copy of your immunization records, go to our tips on locating your immunization records here.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## There is no central registry of all immunizations provided in BC.

If you need a copy of your immunization records, go to our tips on locating your immunization records here.
Immunization Nurse
question: hi, I am need to get a copy of my immunization records from my early childhood. I am now an Alberta resident so I do not remember/have BC health care number. Who should I contact?
question_variation_0: who to contact for immunization records
question_variation_1: who should i contact to get copies of immunization records
question_variation_2: immunization records bc health care number
